price: 12. Waxaanu horey u qaddarnay inuu diido nuujiso (kale) oo dhan4, markaasay (walaashiis timid oo) tidhi: Ma idin tusaa reer idiin daryeelaya, oo iyagu u roonaan.
arabic: ۞ وَحَرَّمۡنَا عَلَيۡهِ ٱلۡمَرَاضِعَ مِن قَبۡلُ فَقَالَتۡ هَلۡ أَدُلُّكُمۡ عَلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِ بَيۡتٖ يَكۡفُلُونَهُۥ لَكُمۡ وَهُمۡ لَهُۥ نَٰصِحُونَ
footnotes: 4. Muuse wuu diiday inay nuujiso haweeney kale oo dhan aan ahayn hooyadiis.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waḥarramnā ʿalayhi al-marāḍiʿa min qablu faqālat hal adullukum ʿalā ahli baytin yakfulūnahu lakum wahum lahu nāṣiḥūna
